mapper.insert: insert into saying (saying_id, saying_author, saying_content, saying_update_time, saying_create_time, saying_status, user_id) values (#{sayingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sayingAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sayingContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sayingUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sayingCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sayingStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select saying_id, saying_author, saying_content, saying_update_time, saying_create_time, saying_status, user_id from saying where saying_id = #{sayingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
